data.name: Sample - TheHive - 1.0.0
data.description: The Hive Security Incident Response Platform involves connecting external security tools, systems, or data sources with The Hive's platform. This integration facilitates centralized incident management, response coordination, and automation, enhancing overall security operations by streamlining incident detection, investigation, and resolution processes.
